mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice(NOTICE_NUMBER_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_FILES, NOTICE_HITS, MNGR_ID, NOTICE_FILE_REAL) VALUES(NOTICE_NUMBER_SEQ_NAME.NEXTVAL, #{NoticeTitle}, #{NoticeWriter}, #{NoticeContent}, #{NoticeFile}, #{NoticeHits}, #{MNGRID}, #{NoticeFileReal})
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_NUMBER_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: update Notice SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{NoticeTitle}, NOTICE_Content = #{NoticeContent}, NOTICE_FILES = #{NoticeFile}, NOTICE_FILE_REAL = #{NoticeFileReal} where NOTICE_NUMBER_SEQ = #{NoticeNum}
update Notice set NOTICE_HITS = NOTICE_HITS+1 where Notice_NUMBER_SEQ = #{NoticeNum}
